select_a_merchant_to_redeem_your_points: Select a merchant to redeem your points
password_and_confirm_password_do_not_mat: Password and confirm password do not match
reward_desc: You can search for users by name or email address. Then select the user you would like to reward and click the 'reward' button.
program_rules_desc: Program Rules apply to Participating Customers only and are not applicable to Vendors or CPE Staff.
browse_merchant_desc: Redeem your points from this list to receive a gift code to use whenever you'd like.
global_merchant_desc: Redeem your points from this list for merchandise, travel, entertainment, events and more!
sent_email: We just sent you an email.
reset_password_desc: Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
reset_password_success: You have successfully reset your password.
order_completed_desc_1: Your order has been completed successfully. Please print this page for your records.
order_completed_desc_2: You can view all of the gift codes that you have purchased by clicking on 'My Gift Codes' in your navigation bar.
congratulations_faq: Congratulations on participating in your Rewards program! Here are some FAQ's to help you understand how the program works.
name: Name
let_us_know: Let us know why you are feeling that way!
congratulations_welcome: Congratulations on earning rewards! Redeem your rewards when you earn them or save them for a 'rainy day'.
set_password_success: You have successfully set your password.
insufficient_balance: You do not have sufficient balance to add this giftcode
redeem_merchants_desc: After redeeming your gift code, you will be asked for a challenge key. The challenge key is the pin number listed to the right of your gift card link. You may need to type this number in, instead of copy and pasting.
what_suggestions_you_have: Let us know what suggestions you have!
what_would_suggest: What would you like to suggest?
enter_email_use_sign_in: Please enter the email address you use to sign in
welcome_message: Welcome to INCENTCO's Global Solutions rewards site! When you participate in our program, you'll earn rewards for various activities.
participant_homepage_message: Rewards can be redeemed with leading national retailers offering millions of products and brands. Redeem your rewards when you earn them or save them up for a 'rainy day'.
redemption_is_on_its_way: Your redemption is on its way! Your code will be delivered to you momentarily
redeem_code_by_visiting: Redeem your gift code by visiting the following URL
what_can_we_help: What can we do to help?
order_desc_1: Clicking 'Confirm My Order' will confirm this redemption and
order_desc_2: will be deducted from your rewards account.
order_desc_3: Once your order has been placed, it cannot be exchanged or cancelled.
order_desc_4: You will receive an immediate confirmation of your order, with instructions on how you can acquire and redeem your gift code.
insufficient_balance_redeem: You do not have sufficient balance to redeem.
redeem_points_desc_1: Redeem Your Points To Purchase Whatever You'd Like From Leading U.S. Merchants
redeem_points_desc_2: Including: Department & Specialty Stores, On-line Retailers, Restaurants, Entertainment & More!
redeem_your_points_desc_1: To Purchase Merchandise, Travel, Events, Charities & More Shipped Directly
redeem_your_points_desc_2: To You In Your Home Country!
thank_you_survey: Thank you for completing this survey. You will be awarded 400 points!
suggestion_survey: Do you have any suggestions how we can improve your employment experience?
satisfy_survey: How satisfied are you with our company overall?
recommend_survey: Would you recommend our company to a friend?
engaging_survey: Do you feel your workplace is engaging?
let_us_know_experience: Please let us know about your experience with our product and service.
no_gift_codes: You do not have any Gift Codes at this time.
oops_unknown_path: Oops! Looks like you've ventured into unknown path.
get_back_on_track: Let's get you back on track:
